name: live_giveaways_by_platform
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool gamerpower.
Tool description: Find all free games, loot and giveaways with this giveaway tracker API powered by GamerPower.com! Access programmatically the best giveaways in gaming!
API description: Insert platform eg: pc, steam, epic-games-store, uplay, gog, icthio, ps4, xbox-one, switch, android, ios, vr, battlenet

platform.description: The gaming platform to fetch giveaways for (e.g., pc, steam, epic-games-store, uplay, gog, itch.io, ps4, xbox-one, switch, android, ios, vr, battlenet).
